user_query: My company is organizing a team-building event. Can you recommend some popular coupons for outdoor activities and adventure sports? Additionally, provide me with a list of nearby restaurants that offer group discounts for large bookings. Lastly, suggest some fun and engaging team-building games that we can incorporate into the event.

TaskList.description: Search for popular coupons related to outdoor activities and adventure sports.
Gather a list of nearby restaurants that offer group discounts for large bookings.
Recommend fun and engaging team-building games suitable for the event.
